callback_with_context.context_function_id: Format(GetIfElse(MaxHealthPercentCanReplenish < 1, Loc("battle_reduced_health_cap"), Loc("x_out_of_y_int")), RoundFloat(HealthPercent * HealthMax), RoundFloat(MinNumericValue(1.0, MaxHealthPercentCanReplenish) * HealthMax))

(hp_current = HealthPercent * HealthMax, hp_cap = RoundFloat(MaxHealthPercentCanReplenish * HealthMax)) => { GetIfElse(MaxHealthPercentCanReplenish < 1, Format(Loc("replenishment_cap"), RoundFloat(hp_cap - hp_current), CcoUiUnitStatRecord("stat_health").Name, hp_cap), "") }

(pcnt = RoundFloat(HealingPower * 100), pcnt_str = Format("%d%", pcnt)) => { GetIfElse(pcnt < 100, Format("[[col:red]]%s[[/col]]", pcnt_str), GetIfElse(pcnt != 100, Format("[[col:green]]%s[[/col]]", pcnt_str), pcnt_str)) }

GetIfElse(IsBarrierCharging == false && BarrierHp != BarrierMaxHp && BarrierSecsUntilRecharge != 0.0, Format("%.1f ", BarrierSecsUntilRecharge), Format("%d ", RoundFloat(BarrierReplenishDelay))) + Loc("seconds")

(regen_str = Format(Loc("battle_hp_regen"), HealthReplenishRateBase * HealthMax * HealingPower)) => { GetIfElse(HealingPower < 1, Format("([[col:red]]%s[[/col]])", regen_str), Format("([[col:green]]%s[[/col]])", regen_str)) }
